item.name: Get all openconfig interfaces from unified
Execute and read cli from inventory
Execute and read cli from inventory and update inventory

request.description:
This requires an http server at 172.17.0.1:9999 serving following file:

{
  "id": "ios2",
  "host": "192.168.1.254",
  "type": "ios",
  "version" : "*",
  "protocol": "ssh",
  "port": 22,
  "username": "cisco",
  "password": "cisco"
}


to do that on linux:

while :
do
	{ echo -ne "HTTP/1.0 200 OK\r\n\r\n"; cat content.json; } | nc -l -p 9999
done

This requires an http server at 172.17.0.1:9999 serving following file:

{
  "id": "ios2",
  "host": "192.168.1.254",
  "type": "ios",
  "version" : "*",
  "protocol": "ssh",
  "port": 22,
  "username": "cisco",
  "password": "cisco"
}


to do that on linux:

while :
do
	{ echo -ne "HTTP/1.0 200 OK\r\n\r\n"; cat content.json; } | nc -l -p 9999
done

item.name: Execute all from cli and update inventory
Get openconfig components and update inventory
Get all openconfig components from unified
Get all openconfig components from unified and update inventory

body.raw:
[{
  "name": "Add_cli_device_to_inventory",
  "description": "add a CLI device to inventory database - INVENTORY, CLI",
  "version": 1,
  "inputParameters": [
	"id[Unique identifier of device across all systems]",
	"type[Type of device or device IOS e.g. ios, ios xr]",
	"version[Version of device or device OS e.g. 15.2]",
	"host[IP or hostname of the management endpoint on a device]",
	"protocol[CLI management transport protocol e.g. tcp or ssh][ssh]",
	"port[TCP port of the management endpoint of a device][22]",
	"username[Username credential]",
	"password[Password credential]"
  ],
  "tasks": [
    {
      "name": "INVENTORY_add_device",
      "taskReferenceName": "INVENTORY_add_device",
      "type": "SIMPLE",
      "inputParameters": {
        "id": "${workflow.input.id}",
		"type": "${workflow.input.type}",
        "version": "${workflow.input.version}",
        "host": "${workflow.input.host}",
        "protocol": "${workflow.input.protocol}",
        "port": "${workflow.input.port}",
        "username": "${workflow.input.username}",
        "password": "${workflow.input.password}"
      }
    }
  ],
  "outputParameters": {
    "id": "${workflow.input.id}"
  },
  "schemaVersion": 2
}]

body.raw:
[{
  "name": "Create_L3VPN_site",
  "description": "Create l3vpn site - L3VPN",
  "version": 1,
  "tasks": [
    {
      "name": "L3VPN_create_l3vpn_site",
      "taskReferenceName": "L3VPN_create_l3vpn_site",
      "type": "SIMPLE",
      "inputParameters": {
        "vpn-id": "${workflow.input.vpn_id}",
		"site-id": "${workflow.input.site_id}",
        "pe-as": "${workflow.input.vpn_pe_as}",
        "bgp-router-id": "${workflow.input.vpn_bgp_router_id}",
        "bgp-route-policy": "${workflow.input.vpn_bgp_route_policy}",
        "site-network-access-id": "${workflow.input.vpn_bgp_route_policy}",
        "device-id": "${workflow.input.vpn_device_id}",
        "device-interface": "${workflow.input.vpn_device_interface}",
        "vpn-as": "${workflow.input.vpn_as}",
        "provider-ip": "${workflow.input.vpn_provider_ip}",
        "customer-ip": "${workflow.input.vpn_customer_ip}",
        "prefix-length": "${workflow.input.vpn_ip_prefix_length}"
      }
    }
  ],
  "outputParameters": {
    "response": "${L3VPN_create_l3vpn_site.output.response_body}",
    "request": "${L3VPN_create_l3vpn_site.output.request_body}"
  },
  "schemaVersion": 2
}]

item.name: Add EXAMPLE add sample device to inventory

body.raw:
[{
  "name": "Terraform_plan_AWS_VPC",
  "description": "Execute terraform AWS VPC in plan mode - TERRAFORM, AWS",
  "version": 1,
  "inputParameters": [
	"vpc_name[Unique name of VPC instance][vpc_1]",
	"vpc_aws_region[Region on AWS to deploy VPC][eu-west-1]",
	"vpc_aws_availability_zones[Region on AWS to deploy VPC][eu-west-1a]",
	"vpc_private_subnets[Private subnets][10.0.1.0/24]",
	"vpc_public_subnets[Public subnets][10.0.101.0/24]",
	"vpc_cidr[Primary CIDR block for your VPC][10.0.0.0/16]",
	"vpc_nat_gateway[Enable public NAT][false]",
	"vpc_single_nat_gateway[Single NAT][false]",
	"vpc_tag_owner[Owner tag][Admin]",
	"vpc_tag_env[Environment tag][Dev]",
	"vpc_tag_descr[Description tag][VPC for testing purposes only]",
	"aws_access_key_id[AWS credentials]",
	"aws_secret_access_key[AWS credentials]"
  ],
  "tasks": [
  	{
      "name": "TERRAFORM_plan",
      "taskReferenceName": "TERRAFORM_plan",
      "type": "SIMPLE",
      "inputParameters": {
        "main_template": "provider \"aws\" {   region = \"${workflow.input.vpc_aws_region}\" }  module \"vpc\" {   source = \"\/home\/app\/terraform-aws-vpc\/\"    name = \"frinx-aws-vpc-automation\"    cidr = \"${workflow.input.vpc_cidr}\"    azs             = [\"${workflow.input.vpc_aws_availability_zones}\"]   private_subnets = [\"${workflow.input.vpc_private_subnets}\"]   public_subnets  = [\"${workflow.input.vpc_public_subnets}\"]    assign_generated_ipv6_cidr_block = true    enable_nat_gateway = ${workflow.input.vpc_nat_gateway}   single_nat_gateway = ${workflow.input.vpc_single_nat_gateway}    public_subnet_tags = {     Name = \"overridden-name-public\"   }    tags = {     Owner       = \"${workflow.input.vpc_tag_owner}\"     Environment = \"${workflow.input.vpc_tag_env}\"   Description=\"${workflow.input.vpc_tag_descr}\"   }    vpc_tags = {     Name = \"${workflow.input.vpc_name}\"   } }",
        "params": "{}",
        "env_vars": "{\"AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID\": \"${workflow.input.aws_access_key_id}\", \"AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY\": \"${workflow.input.aws_secret_access_key}\"}"
      }
    }
  ],
  "outputParameters": {
    "plan": "${TERRAFORM_plan.output.apply}",
    "init": "${TERRAFORM_plan.output.init}",
	"main_tf": "${TERRAFORM_plan.output.main_tf}"

  },
  "schemaVersion": 2
}]

[{
  "name": "Terraform_apply_AWS_VPC",
  "description": "Execute terraform AWS VPC - TERRAFORM, AWS",
  "version": 1,
  "inputParameters": [
	"vpc_name[Unique name of VPC instance][vpc_1]",
	"vpc_aws_region[Region on AWS to deploy VPC][eu-west-1]",
	"vpc_aws_availability_zones[Region on AWS to deploy VPC][eu-west-1a]",
	"vpc_private_subnets[Private subnets][10.0.1.0/24]",
	"vpc_public_subnets[Public subnets][10.0.101.0/24]",
	"vpc_cidr[Primary CIDR block for your VPC][10.0.0.0/16]",
	"vpc_nat_gateway[Enable public NAT][false]",
	"vpc_single_nat_gateway[Single NAT][false]",
	"vpc_tag_owner[Owner tag][Admin]",
	"vpc_tag_env[Environment tag][Dev]",
	"vpc_tag_descr[Description tag][VPC for testing purposes only]",
	"aws_access_key_id[AWS credentials]",
	"aws_secret_access_key[AWS credentials]"
  ],
  "tasks": [
  	{
      "name": "TERRAFORM_apply",
      "taskReferenceName": "TERRAFORM_apply",
      "type": "SIMPLE",
      "inputParameters": {
        "main_template": "provider \"aws\" {   region = \"${workflow.input.vpc_aws_region}\" }  module \"vpc\" {   source = \"\/home\/app\/terraform-aws-vpc\/\"    name = \"frinx-aws-vpc-automation\"    cidr = \"${workflow.input.vpc_cidr}\"    azs             = [\"${workflow.input.vpc_aws_availability_zones}\"]   private_subnets = [\"${workflow.input.vpc_private_subnets}\"]   public_subnets  = [\"${workflow.input.vpc_public_subnets}\"]    assign_generated_ipv6_cidr_block = true    enable_nat_gateway = ${workflow.input.vpc_nat_gateway}   single_nat_gateway = ${workflow.input.vpc_single_nat_gateway}    public_subnet_tags = {     Name = \"overridden-name-public\"   }    tags = {     Owner       = \"${workflow.input.vpc_tag_owner}\"     Environment = \"${workflow.input.vpc_tag_env}\"   Description=\"${workflow.input.vpc_tag_descr}\"   }    vpc_tags = {     Name = \"${workflow.input.vpc_name}\"   } }",
        "params": "{}",
        "output_template": "# VPC\r\noutput \"vpc_id\" {\r\n  description = \"The ID of the VPC\"\r\n  value       = \"$#{module.vpc.vpc_id}\"\r\n}\r\n\r\n# CIDR blocks\r\noutput \"vpc_cidr_block\" {\r\n  description = \"The CIDR block of the VPC\"\r\n  value       = [\"$#{module.vpc.vpc_cidr_block}\"]\r\n}\r\n\r\n\/\/output \"vpc_ipv6_cidr_block\" {\r\n\/\/  description = \"The IPv6 CIDR block\"\r\n\/\/  value       = [\"$#{module.vpc.vpc_ipv6_cidr_block}\"]\r\n\/\/}\r\n\r\n# Subnets\r\noutput \"private_subnets\" {\r\n  description = \"List of IDs of private subnets\"\r\n  value       = [\"$#{module.vpc.private_subnets}\"]\r\n}\r\n\r\noutput \"public_subnets\" {\r\n  description = \"List of IDs of public subnets\"\r\n  value       = [\"$#{module.vpc.public_subnets}\"]\r\n}\r\n\r\n# NAT gateways\r\noutput \"nat_public_ips\" {\r\n  description = \"List of public Elastic IPs created for AWS NAT Gateway\"\r\n  value       = [\"$#{module.vpc.nat_public_ips}\"]\r\n}\r\n",
        "env_vars": "{\"AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID\": \"${workflow.input.aws_access_key_id}\", \"AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY\": \"${workflow.input.aws_secret_access_key}\"}"
      }
    }
  ],
  "outputParameters": {
    "apply": "${TERRAFORM_apply.output.apply}",
    "init": "${TERRAFORM_apply.output.init}",
    "output": "${TERRAFORM_apply.output.output}",
    "main_tf": "${TERRAFORM_apply.output.main_tf}",
    "tf_state": "${TERRAFORM_apply.output.tf_state}"
   },
  "schemaVersion": 2
}]
